title: Return to God, America | Guests: Jonathan Cahn & Ken Paxton | 9/25/20
description:
The Russia probe makes Watergate look tame, as newly released FBI text messages and a revelation about the Steele dossier reveal. Texas Attorney General Ken Paxton discusses the latest mail-in ballot fraud being uncovered in Texas. An Ohio mom was wrestled and arrested for not wearing a mask at a middle school football game. And churchgoers in Moscow, Idaho, were arrested while singing hymns outside without masks. Gabriel Rench, whose arrest went viral, joins to tell the story. A woman turned to Satanism after RBG’s death. This Saturday, “The Harbinger II” author Jonathan Cahn is hosting “The Return” in Washington, D.C. He explains why he believes this year is biblically significant. Learn, then protest. The order is important.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
